summary: Pierre Curie  was a French physicist.
full_text: The American Institute of Physics  promotes science, the profession of physics, publishes physics journals, and produces publications for scientific and engineering societies. The AIP is made up of various member societies. Its corporate headquarters are at the American Center for Physics in College Park, Maryland, but the institute also has an office in Melville, New York and Beijing, China.
title: American Institute of Physics
